page.title: 02PUPILS NATIONALITIES AT LP
page.content: Leighton Park,a Quaker boarding school in Reading, has 305 pupils who live in many different parts of the world.Hong Kong supports the majority of these overseas pupils_ 19 in all. 11 are from the whole of Africa,15 come from Europe_including places like Norway,Belgium,Switzerland,The Netherlands_ as well as from France and Germany. 25% of the pupils go to a country other than the British Isles when they finish school at the end of term, although most of them stay somewhere in England during half_term. Amongst the longest journeys are those to Mexico and Malasia_ over 6,000 miles or 17 hours of flying!!
